bibl.title: Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé.

series.title: Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts.

bibl.seg: Herrero de Jáuregui Miguel, Ana I. Jiménez San Cristóbal, Eugenio R. Luján, Raquel Martín Hernández, Marco A. Santamaría, Sofía Torallas Tovar (Eds.), Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé. (Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 10.)
